short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow KIXEYE Flash games to launch by default in Chrome version 69 and above

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, Flash Player will run by default for KIXEYE games on Facebook or KIXEYE.com. Flash permissions for all other sites will not change.
